column4: Not to be impatient, but does anyone know much about working with the libdvdcss stuff?
I just don't want internet to go down on me, I'm in Afghanistan and the internet sucks here.
in vlc you will get some messagees wwhen you play a cd. check
also my eject button on my cd rom doesn't work, I have to do a right click and eject from the file to make it open...
thats a hardware problem , no can help, but if u have a safety pin, put it in the tiny hole on the cd cover and it will pop out
no it will open with the file, but not by pressing the button. And now VLC is opening it, however, mplayer will not
the button on the physical cdrom drive will not open the drive. However, the mounted file, by right clicking on it, and slecting eject, it will open.
yes its a cdrom button issue
I don't think it is, it will open in windows via button
this is also a new PC. Less than two weeks old
then its cos the program is still reading from drive
